name: 5 Steps From Home: The Final Step
name_original: 5 Steps From Home: The Final Step
description:
You're almost there! This is the final step before finding the remaining ship parts and making your way back home.

This game was made in 1 week for a challenge involving 5 devs making one level each for the game. I was given the final level and a boss battle. Links to the other levels/games can be found on the title screen of this game.

A & D - to move

W - to jump

Space - to shoot

Visit my YouTube channel to watch the 'making of' video for this challenge.
